title: OneDrive-as-a-Hosting Speed Test
body:
There is a new limitation enforced by Google Drive, you can only copy 2tb of bandwidth per file – you could already notice that by not being able to download any file.

Due to that change on Google Drive, Hermietkreeft wants to look if onedrive is fast enough to handle downloads on a mass scale.

He asks you to download one or all 3 of the test samples, abuse it till it dies. I’m sure you can impress him – post a comment with the speeds you were getting and if it was stable or if there were any errors.

https://oneindex.hermietkreeft.site/
